title: ETSI Domain: Data Management + Cultural Heritage
content:
- ### OntologyBlock
  id:: etsi-domain-datamgmt-culture-ontology
  collapsed:: true
	- ontology:: true
	- term-id:: 20343
	- preferred-term:: ETSI Domain: Data Management + Cultural Heritage
	- status:: draft
	- public-access:: true
	- definition:: Crossover domain for ETSI metaverse categorization addressing data preservation and management systems for cultural heritage digitization, archival, and accessibility.
	- source:: [[ETSI GR MEC 032]]
	- maturity:: mature
	- owl:class:: mv:ETSIDomain_DataMgmt_Culture
	- owl:physicality:: VirtualEntity
	- owl:role:: Object
	- owl:inferred-class:: mv:VirtualObject
	- owl:functional-syntax:: true
	- belongsToDomain:: [[InfrastructureDomain]]
	- implementedInLayer:: [[ApplicationLayer]]
	- #### Relationships
	  id:: etsi-domain-datamgmt-culture-relationships
	  collapsed:: true
		- is-subclass-of:: [[Metaverse Infrastructure]]
		- is-part-of:: [[ETSI Metaverse Domain Taxonomy]]
		- has-part:: [[Heritage Database]]
		- has-part:: [[Access Control]]
		- has-part:: [[Preservation System]]
		- has-part:: [[Digital Archive]]
		- requires:: [[Cultural Heritage Digitization]]
		- requires:: [[Data Management]]
		- enables:: [[Educational Outreach]]
		- enables:: [[Long-term Preservation]]
		- enables:: [[Public Access]]
		- depends-on:: [[Archival Standards]]
		- depends-on:: [[Metadata Schemas]]
